abstract: The arrival of Windows 7 could make life harder, not easier, on Microsoft as it tries to fend off Linux in the netbook market.
snippet: The arrival of Windows 7 could make life harder, not easier, on Microsoft as it tries to fend off Linux in the netbook market.
lead_paragraph: Forget the fancy new features coming in Windows 7. The operating system really stands out as something to watch because of its business implications for Microsoft.
